get.description: Retrieves user profile information. If username is not provided, returns the current user's profile
Checks if the user has enough reputation to perform specific actions (createTag, comment, upvote, downvote)

put.description: Updates the current user's profile information

get.description: Retrieves a paginated list of questions created by the authenticated user
Retrieves a paginated list of all questions with sorting options

post.description: Creates a new question with specified title, content, and tags

put.description: Updates the content of an existing question

get.description: Retrieves detailed information about a specific question including answers and comments
Search questions by keyword and tag with pagination support
Retrieves personalized question recommendations for the user
Retrieves the edit history of a specific question
Finds questions that are similar to the specified question

post.description: Adds a new comment to the specified question
Submits an answer to the specified question
Adds an upvote to the specified question
Adds a downvote to the specified question

delete.description: Removes a question and all its associated content

put.description: Marks an answer as the accepted solution for the question
Marks a question as closed, preventing new answers and comments
Updates the content of an existing comment. Only the comment owner can perform this operation.

delete.description: Removes a comment from the system. Only the comment owner or moderators can perform this operation.

get.description: Retrieves a paginated list of all public collections

post.description: Creates a new question collection for the authenticated user

get.description: Search for collections by name or description
Get collections with information about whether a specific question is included in each collection
Retrieves detailed information about a specific collection including its questions

delete.description: Permanently removes a collection and its associations

get.description: Search for questions within a specific collection
Retrieves all collections created by the authenticated user

post.description: Adds the collection to user's liked collections

delete.description: Removes the collection from user's liked collections

post.description: Add or remove questions from a collection

get.description: Retrieves a paginated list of questions that the authenticated user has bookmarked

post.description: Adds the specified question to the user's bookmarks for later reference

delete.description: Removes the specified bookmark from the user's bookmarked questions

get.description: Simple endpoint to verify the auth service is running

post.description: Generates a new access token using a valid refresh token
Authenticates user credentials and returns access and refresh tokens
Creates a new user account with the provided credentials and returns authentication tokens

put.description: Updates the content of an existing answer. Only the answer owner can perform this operation.

delete.description: Removes an answer from the system. Only the answer owner or moderators can perform this operation.

post.description: Allows users to upvote or downvote an answer. Users can only vote once, but can change their vote.

get.description: Retrieves various system analytics based on the specified category
